channel.title: Blog.elmah.io on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Blog.elmah.io on .NET Ramblings

item.title: elmah.io Blog - .NET Technical tutorials/guides and new features
item.description: .NET 9 is releasing in mid-November 2024. Like every .NET version, this introduces several important features and enhancements aligning developers with an ever-changing development ecosystem. In this blog series, I will explore critical updates in different areas of .NET. For this post, I will look through advancements in System.Text. Link to article: https://blog.elmah.io/whats-new-in-net-9-system-text-json-improvements/
